website_summaries.verdict: This innerspring mattress feels more like the real thing – offering you and your baby more sleep time. But it's not firm enough for newborns.
pros: Antibacterial, waterproof, lock- stitched binding helps prevent mold, mildew, and odor
Reinforced waterproof cover resists liquids and stains
cons: A bit soft for newborns, who need firmer mattresses for safety reasons

customer_reviews.title: I was hesitant ordering this mattress because I thought how good can a pack n play mattress be
customer_reviews.text: HIGHLY IMPRESSED! I was hesitant ordering this mattress because I thought how good can a pack n play mattress be? It's crib mattress quality, just smaller. I transitioned my sleeping (8 month old) from my bed where he fell asleep this evening to the new mattress in his pack n play and he hasn't moved. Normally he wakes up. I had some cheapy pad on there until this one came. If I was a baby, I'd love this mattress. It also fits PERFECTLY inside my Graco pack n play. A must have if your baby is going to be spending some time in the pack n play.
customer_reviews.author: Britni

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous metal spring cutting through mattress
customer_reviews.text: DANGEROUS- This would have been a great mattress as it fit the Graco pack n play very well, but there was a metal sharp spring poking through the mattress that could have cut the baby! Glad we found it before we put her on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Firm but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time pulling the trigger on these types of purchases...I go back and forth and read and compare all the reviews. But I am very happy with this mattress. The baby is sleeping very comfortably and the mattress fits our Graco pack n play well (the one with the bassinet attachment and changing table). We just moved her from a small sleeper to this and she seems happy. We currently have it on the upper level, but the baby is getting stronger and more mobile and we will have to lower it soon. Still, baby is sleeping great!
customer_reviews.author: Kia

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress. I originally bought the foam one (in pictures) thinking it would be soft, but it was stiff as a board and really noisy. This mattress is fantastic! It fits perfectly into the playard with no gaps and it is soft – perfect for a baby or toddler. We use the pack n play for travel with my son who is now 13 months old and 23 lbs and he slept the whole night through on this mattress with no issue. I'd recommend this mattress to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: It is firm enough for a young baby and I'm sure would be great if it actually fit my playard
customer_reviews.text: After realizing the Dream on Me Portable Crib mattress only works in the bassinet position on my Chicco Lullaby playard, I have been searching for a larger mattress that I can use in the bottom. This is still too small (about 3 inches too short and 1 inch too narrow), but the mattress seems to be well made. You can feel the springs but I don't think it would disrupt baby sleep. It is firm enough for a young baby and I'm sure would be great if it actually fit my playard. This would be a little hard to travel with because the springs make it so firm. It will be going back and my search continues...
customer_reviews.author: SHSTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Buy inner spring, not foam.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a foam mattress first. My daughter, who normally falls asleep within 5 minutes and sleeps all night in her crib, was restless and made sure we all knew that she wasn't comfortable. This lasted 30 minutes to an hour before she fell asleep. This was every night for a week. Then I bought this mattress and used it in the same play yard and same sheet. She fell asleep within 5 minutes and slept all night.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Good pack n play mattress
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughters pack n play for naps and night time sleeping we have co sleeped since birth so I'm not sure how she going to do with it not being as cushiony like our bed it is a firm mattress. The only thing i really do not like is that its got the fire retardent on it but we got some organic bed cover to go over it and then a regular sheet. Our pack n play is 25 1/2 X 37 and this fits perfect with no gaps
customer_reviews.author: Kailee Lafer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I have an Eddie Bauer pack & play. According to the labels it is made by Cosco. This mattress fit perfectly, no gaps on sides. When I measured the Pack & Play I looked for a mattress close to the measurments of 36X24. I am very pleased with this mattress. My grand-daughter has not slept on it yet but I know it will be great. It felt firm but not hard & as she gets older & heavier it will hold up good. I also bought a mattress pad & a sheet from Amazon, American Baby Company Jersey sheet & portable/mini mattress pad cover. Both fit the mattress perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long!
customer_reviews.text: My baby is only six months old and this mattress already has a huge dip in the middle. He’s not a big baby and is just now starting to turn over on his stomach. I feel that it would be a very dangerous to allow him to keep sleeping on this mattress with such a big divet in the middle. It could be a suffocation problem for him to not be on a hard flat surface. And the unfortunate part is this mattress only has a three month warranty!!! As far as warrantees go it’s not very good.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin E. Kenney

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: We got this little matress for my 6 month old for our basement when I was down there and needed him to sleep. Works perfect for what we needed. Isn't top rated quality, but does the job. I would not recommend traveling with this because the matress looks like it would rip.
customer_reviews.author: Valorie

customer_reviews.title: My 5 month old son had to sleep at his grandparents in their pack n play unexpectedly one night and it was horrible - he thrashe
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for any parent/grandparent/child care provider that will utilize a pack n play. My 5 month old son had to sleep at his grandparents in their pack n play unexpectedly one night and it was horrible - he thrashed and rolled all night and was a crab the next day. I purchased this for his stay while we were gone on a weekend getaway and it was perfect. He slept 10 hours the first night and just shy of 12 the second (thats more than at home!). Could not be more satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Molly L

customer_reviews.title: Too soft. Returned.
customer_reviews.text: We needed a mattress for our 14 month old to sleep in his pack n play when we go on vacation. He sleeps very well in his crib on a Naturepedic organic cotton 150 mattress, which is very firm. I am trying to mimic his bed and this would not have done it. I ordered the same brand foam mattress and it arrived today. It is much firmer and I will be keeping that one.
customer_reviews.author: PeeKay

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly!!
customer_reviews.text: My sister-in-law suggested I buy this mattress for the pack n play because she said it’s so much more comfortable. I just got it today and put it in the crib. It fits perfectly! I can’t wait for one of my grandkids to come over and sleep in it now!
customer_reviews.author: SuzB

customer_reviews.title: FITS GRACO!
customer_reviews.text: This fits my pack n play PERFECTLY. I was so anxious after ready so many reviews for mattresses that have big gaps in the cribs, but this is perfect. I have the pack n play that has the bassinet/changing table station that you can remove. So I now have it lowered b/c my son is nine months. And I also have a foam on top of this mattress to make it a bit higher. It doesn't gap at all, fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ava M.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Use this ALL THE TIME got it about a year ago and I'm pregnant with my second and will definitely be using it. Regular crib matress sheets fit on it. It fits perfectly in my graco pack n play. It's a little bulky to travel with especially if you have a small car. It took up my whole trunk but now that I have an SUV it's not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Mae

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for graco pack n play w/ reversible napper/changer
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in our Graco pack n play with reversible napper and changer. It is definitely more comfortable than the piece of cardboard that Graco had originally in there, but it doesn't seem to affect our son's sleep. He still wakes up for feedings.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: This one fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Recieved on time. Exactly what I was looking for. I have a graco pack n play with changer and newborn sleeper and since my newborn will be sleeping in this in our room for the first 6 months I wanted an additional mattress rather than the cheap one that comes with the pack n play. This one fits like a glove! It also fits the regular pack n play sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Firm support and Sound sleep for Baby
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for Pack N' Play mattress and 3" mattress provides comfort and excellent support for baby. Suggested accompanying sheets are also a good fit. Highly recommend this product and so much better that the thin pad which comes with Pack N' Play. Spend the money and get this 'cause your child will sleep much more soundly.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Won't disappoint!!
customer_reviews.text: I was contiplating buying my son a toddler bed but quickly realized he wasn't quite ready for one yet. I was hesitant in purchasing a mattress for his pac and play online but came across this one that had decent reviews. So I took a chance and ordered it. I just received it a few hours ago and I must say it didn't disappoint one bit!! It fit perfectly in his pac and play and it's extremely comfortable. Little guy fell right out for a nap within 45 mins of laying on it. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Zoppi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for the Pack and Play
customer_reviews.text: This mattress fits just perfectly in the pack and play. I ordered for my granddaughter that is just over a year old to nap on. It seems to be more comfortable than the thin hard matt that comes with the pack and play. The same sheets fit this mattress. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easily one of the best 'Baby' purchases we made
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why they even sell play-pens that don't come with these! Our play-pen/play-yard was virtually unusable until we got this. It adds the height and stability our baby needed to play and sleep in the playpen.
customer_reviews.author: Evie Ng

customer_reviews.title: Baby sleeps wonderfully on this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality mattress that fit my Graco pack’n’play perfectly! It is very dense and heavy for a little mattress so don’t try to travel with it. But for the purpose of a small crib in our bedroom this was exactly what I needed and my baby sleeps wonderfully on it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I have tired and tired and this is the first time I could get our grandbaby to sleep in her Pack N Play! This Carina Collection Pack N Play mattress makes her Plack and Pay feel more like her crib mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Y

customer_reviews.title: This mattress is a great concept. It's perfect for extended trips away from ...
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is a great concept. It's perfect for extended trips away from home when you want your child to be comfortable. It fit perfectly in my child's Graco Pasadena pack n play. However, my daughter did not sleep on it because we were out of town and she refused to sleep in her pack n play. I thought this mattress would help but it didn't. But it wasn't the mattress, just her wanting to sleep with mommy in a strange place :)
customer_reviews.author: LJoy

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is awesome our little girl is 5 months and she would wake up just about every 3 hours with the original mattress this mattress seems so much more comfortable she has slept through the night multiple times ever since we purchased this mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good quality Pack N Play mattress. Fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I watch my great-grandson occasionally who is 0 years old. I use a Pack N Play for his naps. I purchased the mattress so that he would be safer then he would be with a quilt or blankets under him. I found peace of mind and he was comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette

customer_reviews.title: Must have.
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! For any parent with a pack n play. This mattress made it so much more comfortable for my daughter than the padded sheets that you get for a pack n play. I was also able to pass it on to my new little niece in perfect like new condition
customer_reviews.author: NOLA Mom

customer_reviews.title: Fits Graco Pack N Play cuddle cove LX
customer_reviews.text: The mattress fits our pack n play perfectly, and the measurements are as described. It is firm, which is most important to me for safety reasons. The parent's choice play yard fitted sheets fit perfectly. So far, this mattress has met our expectations. 4 stars Due to the fact that it was shipped in only a scuffed up plastic bag, so it was a little uneven on one side and had a few little dirt stains from shipment that cannot be cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: amzn_azn

customer_reviews.title: Better for older/bigger babies
customer_reviews.text: This was the second mattress I bought for our Graco Pack and Play. First one was just foam and was destroyed by the cat and we had to have one immediately for a vacation. I thought the 2 year old was outgrowing the pack & play because she wasn't sleeping as well in it. Turns out she just needed a better mattress. The coils in this one made the differences. Heavier, thicker, and much better for an older baby. Because it was thicker it fit better in the pack & play. Worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Has been worth it
customer_reviews.text: My 6 month old will only sleep on this or a regular mattress. It is not very firm so I put it on top of the "mattress" that comes with the Pack n Play which has a hard bottom. It fits in our Pack n Play perfectly with no gaps. We've had it for over a year (since having our first kid) and it has retained its original shape, though we didn't have to use the Pack n Play very much with our oldest. I am satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: VK

customer_reviews.title: It's Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is superb! I am thrilled that we purchased this particular model. We have been extremely blessed that our child has slept in her crib through the night since a very early age. Our first trip away from home I was terrified that her sleeping in a pack-n-play would break this wonderful 'sleeping through the night' routine. This mattress did not disappoint. My daughter slept through the night on this mattress the same as she did at home. She also enjoys sitting on the mattress and playing.
customer_reviews.author: Jsavoy4

customer_reviews.title: Best pack and play mattress
customer_reviews.text: Fits the pack and play perfectly. I love that it's American made. We bought this to replace the thin mat it comes with. Our granddaughter rests/sleeps comfortably on this mattress. Very pleased and the price is very reasonable for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: LovemyJRTs

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Graco Pack'n'play so that my daughter could sleep in the pack'n'play on vacation. It is high quality and thicker than the regular pack'n'play mattress. My 1 year old loves to sleep on this mattress. No complaints. It does need bigger sheets than the regular pack'n'play mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Fits Graco pack n play and co-sleeper perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this but as for fit it fits my Graco pack n play as well as the full size co-sleeper we have perfectly. No gaps at all. I used circo pack new play sheets on it. They are a bit tight but work just fine. I was concerned after reading other reviews that talked about unsafe gaps left around the sides. I see absolutely no way my baby could get himself between the mattress and the pack n play or co-sleeper sides. He couldn't even get his hand down in there I don't think, much less his head or entire body
customer_reviews.author: Mel B

customer_reviews.title: Makes a pack & play comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad that I purchased this pack & play mattress! It makes the Graco pack & play that I purchased so much more comfortable for my daughter to sleep in. My daughter would never sleep in one before and I was looking for a solution so that I could get her to sleep at her grandparents house (her babysitters). Once I ordered this she started sleeping as well there as she did in her crib. The mattress is quite nice and is definitely an innerspring mattress (you can feel them when you squeeze the mattress). Definitely a great purchase & I would recommend it to all of my friends that have babies in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Ridnerjen

customer_reviews.title: I was very skeptical after reading many of the reviews but couldn't be happier with this mattress
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my granddaughter to sleep on in the Pack N' Play as the pad that comes with it is way too thin. I was very skeptical after reading many of the reviews but couldn't be happier with this mattress. It fits well and my granddaughter sleeps very soundly on it. Would recommend to all who are looking for something better for their babies to sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra P.

customer_reviews.title: Went with the 3" since it had slightly better reviews. I have not had a single issues ...
customer_reviews.text: Was very torn on the 3 or 5" mattress for my baby girl. Went with the 3" since it had slightly better reviews. I have not had a single issues with this matters and my baby seems to love it. It is very firm but that is what I wanted. Shipped quick too. I have a dream on me mini crib and it fits very snug no gaps.
customer_reviews.author: JulieAnn

customer_reviews.title: Makes the pack n play a comfy bed for babies!
customer_reviews.text: The matress is so great for the pack n play, it makes the pack n play like a real bed. It doesn’t fold or anything so it isn’t great to travel, but it’s worth bringing.
customer_reviews.author: Candida Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: You can still feel the springs so it's not great but it's a LOT better than the regular 0
customer_reviews.text: Not many choices for supplemental pack-n-play mattresses. This innerspring one is a lot softer than the foam version. You can still feel the springs so it's not great but it's a LOT better than the regular 0.5" pack-n-play mattresses. We supplement these by adding a thick soft blanket between the mattress and the fitted sheet. This combination keeps my babies comfortable all night!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse A. Safir

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Sleeps Great!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this mattress for our pack and play. It fits perfectly. We also use a mattress pad over the mattress for additional comfort. I read some reviews that the mattress wore out quickly. We have had this mattress for 9 months and it is used 3 days out of the week for naps and bedtime for our grandson. It has yet to loose its sturdiness/firmness. I don't have any concerns about his comfort when sleeping. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Shmonica Harmonica

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable mattress
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is very comfortable in this mattress however the mattress recently ripped and i have only had it a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Mali T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for graco pack and play. We ended up keeping our daughter in our room for 10months and switched her to the pack and play after the bassinet so this helped her and us sleep well knowing she would still be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Erin McMullen

customer_reviews.title: Better than the original Pack and Play mattress
customer_reviews.text: The mattress that came with the pack and play ended up sinking right in the middle. I bought this to replace it and find that my son is much more comfortable. I ended up buying a second one for the pack and play at my parents house.
customer_reviews.author: KrisR

customer_reviews.title: Nice mattress for the little ones pac n play
customer_reviews.text: Fits the pac n play perfectly and gives good support for the little kiddo. The outer material is a type of vinyl and prevents accidents from ruining it. When not in use we just store it under the crib. Might be a bit combersom for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Wood

customer_reviews.title: I ordered some of the American Baby sheets for it and they fit great. Definitely worth it for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mattress to use in our Graco pack and play for a week long trip. Fit perfectly. It added some comfort for our little guy- who is used to sleeping in his comfy crib. I ordered some of the American Baby sheets for it and they fit great. Definitely worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Scheetz

customer_reviews.title: Buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love!!!! Firm mattress. Fits exactly to a pack and play. No gaps, no space. Love it!!!! Did I mention I love this? It's a great buy. Great product. And yes, firm so you don't worry about baby sleeping. Seriously, buy this if you have a pack n play. Babies R Us only carry the 1 inch mattress that doesn't even fit the pack and play. Don't bother. This is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: The Pack & Play Mattress
customer_reviews.text: It was not boxed when it arrived, making it difficult for me to pack away the nursery items I am saving up for; and it wasn't as sturdy as a normal-size mattress...it flops over while trying to sit it up; however, it is the perfect mattress foundation for jumping or playing on as toddlers will do. Not ideal for the portability factors of visiting away from home.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn Toliver

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Babies loved it. Heck, I want to sleep on it. When they have grown out of them I plan to use them camping. Of course I will need to put both of them together.
customer_reviews.author: BlackGun

customer_reviews.title: My daughter sleeps great on this and there are no gaps at all
customer_reviews.text: My daughter sleeps great on this and there are no gaps at all. I have graco pack n plays. She is almost 4 months and too big for the co sleeper. This is perfect and more comfortable for her. I had a mattress pad that I used previously and it fits perfectly over this. I'm glad I went with this one and not the foam.
customer_reviews.author: BreannaM

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is perfect for our Graco pack and play! It is very comfortable and not hard at all. It also fits wonderfully, there are no gaps on the sides at all. Baby sleeps much more comfortably than he would on that piece of cardboard that comes with the pack and play. Extremely glad I purchased this and I would recommend to anyone looking for a pack and play mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Mercy

customer_reviews.title: Loose Springs
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of the Dream On Me Inner Spring Mattresses. As soon as I took them out of the box I could feel the springs inside. My children only weigh from 21-25lbs, they also could feel the springs inside the mattress. Two of the mattresses had springs come loose in them. Amazon was amazing with assisting with returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy for baby! Better than the foam model!
customer_reviews.text: We keep this at grandma's house and LOVE it. We also have the foam version at the other grandparents' house, but the baby seems to prefer this one much more. The baby has no problem sleeping on the pack 'n play with this mattress. I don't know if it is chemical free, so I would not use it for daily use, but perfect for occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: EastCoastFam

customer_reviews.title: Baby seems to like it and is comfy
customer_reviews.text: A little gap on sides for my Graco pack n play however I just rolled a towel and filled the gap. Baby is older so not worried about it. Baby seems to like it and is comfy, way better than cheap board pack n play comes with. Added a mattress pad for extra comfort.
customer_reviews.author: TXMOM💕

customer_reviews.title: He seems comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fit my pack n play - 7 month old is still sleeping in our room sinde his nursery is on another floor. He seems comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Lacey S

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need with some modification.
customer_reviews.text: I wish it were made of organic material, that would add another star to the review. Also, it doesn't fit my GRACO perfectly, I had to add some pieces of foam around the sides to make sure my LO didn't get stuck in the sides. That would have added another star. As for comfort, it seems great. He sleeps well and I feel secure knowing when we travel he's good to go. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mattress for the price, small gap when used with Pack N Play
customer_reviews.text: Nice and firm mattress resembling baby's actual crib mattress, I used it with American Baby jersey fitted sheet and quilted mattress cover and those fit perfectly. There is a small gap on the sides of the mattress when used with my Graco Pack n Play, probably about 1-1/2 inches if pushed to one side. It's better than trying to get my baby to sleep on the hard pad that comes with the pack n play, but I wish this was a bit more snug fitting. I may try to shove something in the sides so that there isn't such a large gap.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Smith

customer_reviews.title: Seems great!
customer_reviews.text: So far, it’s great. Very firm and impossible for toddler to crawl under (which has been our issue). Also, having a mattress really helps keep the base of pack n play from bending and buckling.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Better than Dream on Me foam mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is better than this companies foam mattress. I originally ordered the foam and it was too hard (harder than the mat that comes with the pack n play), so I ordered this. Compared the two side by side and this one wins hands down. Firm enough to be safe but much softer/more give to it than the playard mat. Fits graco pack m play beautifully. Much like a normal crib mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha T.

customer_reviews.title: Great portable mattress
customer_reviews.text: Have had this mattress going on three years and it still looks great and still comfortable. I use it over the existing past mattresses on our pack and play.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: A must have for pack 'n' play!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our (then) infant son to sleep in the pack 'n' play next to our bed. We didn't like the flat hard one that it came with so we decided on this one. We are so happy with the quality of it and how comfortable my son sleeps through the night. We would definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: At first I was concerned about ordering anything by Dream on Me because of a bad experience with a play yard but I was very pleased with this product. It fit my Graco play yard perfectly and had no plastic smell. It was firm yet my grandson slept all night. I used a regular crib sheet without a problem. It is certainly thinner than a regular mattress but it had the dimensions that were advertised. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great quality mattress
customer_reviews.text: Great quality mattress, but unfortunately didn't fit my Graco Pack n Play 293CN Series. It was smaller by around 2 inches, leaving dangerous gaps. I had to return it. I wish they would make it a tiny bit bigger. Ended up buying another brand mattress size 28 x 39, which fitted perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rocio

customer_reviews.title: No jumping, you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.text: Nice mattress, d it d the job for my tots bed. Rips after little wear and tear(kid jumping on the bed)
customer_reviews.author: R.Williams

customer_reviews.title: and provides better comfort for our little one
customer_reviews.text: This product fit perfectly in our Gracco Playard (Pack n Play), and provides better comfort for our little one. Note that there are several different types of these mattresses - we went with the inner spring version and couldn't be happier. Most important thing is that our little guy slept great on this during our recent two week vacation to see the grandparents, so he gives it two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: B. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Much better than I hoped
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is great for my aon's Graco Pack n Play. I was worried it wouldn't fit but it's snug to the edges like other people have said. I can shove my hand between but that's only because the mesh stretches. Baby sleeps very well on it & I'm happy that I bought it. I'd rather have the 5" one, but since my boy is getting long, I think it's safer I bought this one instead.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey N.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic mattress
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress! My toddler sleeps on it in her Graco pack'n'play when we travel and it fits perfectly. It's really comfortable. Crib sheets are a bit loose on it but they work, and pack'n'play sheets work as well. It's a big improvement over the thin mat that comes with the pack'n'play, I'm so glad we found it!
customer_reviews.author: readingcat25

customer_reviews.title: Fits our Graco Pack 'n Play Playard Bassinet Changer with Cuddle Cove Rocking Seat!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase! It fits our Graco Pack 'n Play Playard Bassinet Changer with Cuddle Cove Rocking Seat perfectly and our son slept so well on it on his first overnight! We purchased the Margaux & May Pack N Play Waterproof Mini Crib Mattress Pad Protector and an organic sheet to go on top and it was just like his real crib!
customer_reviews.author: MBK

customer_reviews.title: Mini Crib Matress
customer_reviews.text: Fit our Pack n Play perfectly. Not a "foam" matress, actually has springs. Just like a regular crib matress, only smaller. Pretty firm, but still soft. Much nicer than the thin pad it came with. Our little one loves it, and sleeps better (and longer!)
customer_reviews.author: J. Collins

customer_reviews.title: ... the pack n play very well and provides a comfortable bed for our almost nine month old grand
customer_reviews.text: Fits the pack n play very well and provides a comfortable bed for our almost nine month old grand.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia R.

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like a great mattress
customer_reviews.text: This mattress seemed great! We bought it for our Graco Pak 'n play and it fit perfectly. We ended up returning it because we wanted a mattress that is easy for travel. Because I couldn't easily pack this for a flight, we opted to return it. I have no complaints, and was actually torn about keeping it for road trips, but ultimately, couldn't justify buying two mattresses for the pak 'n play.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in our pack n play. We currently live between two places so we got the mattress to use in the pack n play for the location we use less frequently. Feels just like a crib mattress and our son sleeps well in this. He wouldn't sleep for long in the one that came with the pack n play.
customer_reviews.author: K.J. Bollman

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but this mattress worked out so well, I wanted to share. I bought 2 of these mattresses, one for a Graco pack and play, and one for a Safety 1st pack and play. It fit both perfectly. We spent a week on vacation with our 15 months twins, they slept on these mattresses better than they sleep at home (maybe it was the beach air too). The mattress is very similar to their crib mattress. And we didn't do any practice runs ahead of time. Highly recommend !!
customer_reviews.author: twinmomma

customer_reviews.title: too soft
customer_reviews.text: It was helpful as we use our pack an play in our bedroom so that our son sleeps in the same room as us. But after a few nights, we notice a dip in the center of the mattress. By all means, my son is not heavy at all. The mattress is too soft and my son toss and turn all night long. It might work for others but not for us.
customer_reviews.author: DSL

customer_reviews.title: Amazon sold me a used mattress
customer_reviews.text: The mattress itself is fine, but it was definitely used. The plastic package was ripped up and safety tags are cut off. It's a big item, so I can't just go and return it to the nearest locker. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Veronika

customer_reviews.title: Simply & comfortable !!!
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is great for a small child to still be close to mom & dad!!! My granddaughter who is 15 months old is so comfortable & no worries about rolling out . My daughter uses it in a pack & play so she can still have room in her bedroom for baby to be close at night! Great Buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stand the test of time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my newborn to sleep on. After only 12 weeks the mattress is bowing in the center where he lays. I’ve tried laying him different directions but ultimately the mattress is breaking down and not holding up as well as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so that our almost two year old can sleep on something more comfortable than the thin pad the pack and play comes with... its perfect! For the price, it's a steal. It's slightly inconvenient to travel with but worth it for our heavy guy to have somewhere sturdy to sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C.

customer_reviews.title: Great little mattress for the price- BUT it did not ...
customer_reviews.text: Great little mattress for the price- BUT it did not fit my grace play-yard. It was about 2.5@ to short and 2" in width. I had to roll up sheets to fill the gaps.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great for seasonal homes or vacations
customer_reviews.text: My infant son sleeps on this mattress inside a pack and play when we visit our seasonal cottage. It fits perfectly and is much more comfortable than a regular pack and play mattress. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: E. Nadeau

customer_reviews.title: Ok this is much better than I hoped
customer_reviews.text: Ok this is much better than I hoped. The mattress fits perfectly in the graco playpen. I love that it has springs, I think personally is much better than the foam version. My grandson loves it- much better than the thin mattress provided with the playpen. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sassy

customer_reviews.title: I like that there isn't any gap either
customer_reviews.text: fits my older Graco pack and play perfectly. I did however have to order new sheets as my old ones had been washed and dried so many times and were only for the thinner pads and not a three inch mattress. I like that there isn't any gap either. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: CWatson

customer_reviews.title: Love the mattress
customer_reviews.text: Love the mattress. Fits our pack n play Perfect. I would recommend buying the American Baby Company sheets that fit the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Nice and firm.  Fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Planning to use this for baby #2's main crib until #1 outgrows the regular crib. #1 has fun jumping on the mattress in the pack n play so maybe I will make him sleep in it if I feel it's not firm enough once #2 gets here. All in all, very glad I got the one with the innersprings instead of just foam. I think it will hold up better and not get flat, and is probably more firm.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Phalange

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pack n Play mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little mattress! Soft and comfy addition for my granddaughter! Much nicer than the foam only mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: FishLikeAGirl

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought this 2 years ago!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my pack-n-play for vacations where my toddler has to sleep in it for several nights. I swear he has been sleeping better since we put this in! It really is like a real mini mattress with good support. Pack n plays have horrible bottoms with that board that folds, and this fixed it right up!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie K.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for spleeping there!
customer_reviews.text: The matress is Great! It is not to soft or to firm. My 8 week baby slept the first night spleeping on this matress for 5 hours; which is a lot for a baby so young. I had ordered first the dream on me foam matress and I can say it is not designed to spleep on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress! I was about to go with a different one (I believe it was a foam one), but I'm glad I went with this one! It isn't hard at all, and not way too overly soft (which is dangerous) - it's perfect! And it fits perfectly and snug in the pack 'n play that I have!
customer_reviews.author: Cayla

customer_reviews.title: It feels firm and supportive yet seems comfortable for baby
customer_reviews.text: Fits the pack n play perfectly. Used this recently on a vacation and baby slept every night without issues. It feels firm and supportive yet seems comfortable for baby.
customer_reviews.author: REK

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Fits the regular portacrib. You need the larger size mattress for the twin ports crib.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Nice mattress, but seems somewhat softer than I expect
customer_reviews.text: Nice mattress, but seems somewhat softer than I expect, since they recommend a firmer mattress for babies, this probably could be a little firmer, but as my grandson grows bigger, this will probably be okay, certainly better than what comes with most Pack n Play cribs, which is generally thin foam.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Olson

customer_reviews.title: Best choice for a pack 'n play
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered the foam mattress. BIG MISTAKE. This one is MUCH better quality and not hard as a rock like the other. My baby seems to sleep very comfortably on it. Fits great with my normal size graco pack 'n play.
customer_reviews.author: sje375

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for a play yard. Good for overnight sleep.
customer_reviews.text: The mattres is very nice. I like that it's waterproof and can be easily cleaned, no need to invest in a waterproof cover. Good for overnight sleep if there is limited space in the room for a full size crib. Fits perfectly in my Graco play yard.
customer_reviews.author: Ilona

customer_reviews.title: Made all the difference!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was perfect for our son who previously hated his pack n' play. The 3" is ideal for us as it was light, skinny, and easy to pack in the car for vacation. We bought a fitted sheet for the mattress, but just used a regular crib mattress pad and tucked the excess pad under. It worked great, and now our son gladly naps and sleeps in his pack n' play!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob fimon

customer_reviews.title: Too short for Chicco Pack and Play
customer_reviews.text: Mattress quality seems great. Too short for Chicco pack and play.
customer_reviews.author: Londanian

customer_reviews.title: Make Pack N Play More Like Crib!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a more crib-like mattress for our pack n play to use at the Grandparents' house. This is perfect! Our two-year-old is still sleeping in her crib, and this makes the pack n play feel more like her crib at home. It fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey R. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This was thicker than I expected and fit right into my pack n' play. I didn't like the thin hard bottoms to the pack n play so I bought this instead. It's also nice because I'm short and so are my arms and this gave me the perfect height to reach in comfortably and pick up my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L. Sison

customer_reviews.title: A little firm but a MUCH better mattress for our pack n play.
customer_reviews.text: I know a lot of people said their mattress didn't fit their pack n play but I have a Graco Pack N Play on the go and it fits perfectly. Now, the sides of the pack n plays are mesh so if you push on them, yes there is room between the mattress and the mesh but otherwise, there isn't an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly E McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Great thicker mattress for Graco Pack n Play
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mattress. I used it for my grandson's Graco Pack n Play. It fit perfectly. It was much better than the thin pad that comes with the Graco. It was nice when he visited - I could use it as bed. He slept well.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant about ordering this for my daughter. She was so used to sleeping with us since birth that I was afraid she wouldn't be comfortable. Fortunately I was wrong! She sleeps so soundly with this mattress when before, she'd fall asleep on the hard mat that the play yard came with and wake up almost immediately. I purchased the quilted matteress cover also and would definitely purchase both again!
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: High quality mattress, our newborn sleeps like a baby
customer_reviews.text: Our newborn son sleep beautifully on this mattress. We purchased it for his first trip outside our home and it worked very well. This is a quality mattress.
customer_reviews.author: FrequentDCFlyer

product_meta.title: Dream On Me 3" Pocket Coil Graco Pack 'n Play Mattress
product_meta.description:
Dream On Me 25I-GR, mattress 3" Inner spring mattress fits most Graco play yard. It's constructed to create a comfortable environment to play and sleep. This exceptional mattress bacterial waterproof cover that wipes clean with mild soap and water and aids in the prevention of mold, mildew and odor. Dimensions: 25.5"X 37.5"X 3". Meets Federal Standard Flammability Standard 16-CFR 1633.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Dream On Me recommends this mattress to be used with the below listed “Play Yards” 

Graco Day2Night Sleep System #1852644
Baby Trend Nursery Center (Tanzania Collection) #PY81979
Safety 1st Disney Baby Sweet Wonder Playard #PY379EKY
Cosco Funsport Playard#PY384DHC
Graco Pack 'N Play Snuggle Suite LX Playard #1927563
Graco Pack 'n Play (Pasadena Collection) #1801373
Fisher Price Ultra Lite Day & Night Playard#CJK24-998
 * When using this mattress, please make sure it fits tightly in play yard without any gaps between mattress and side walls of the play yard.
 * NEVER use this mattress on the top level of Play yard in its bassinet position.
 * KEEP ALL FOREIGN OBJECTS OUT OF THE PLAY YARD Including
 * Pillows
 * Quilts
 * Comforters
 * Cushions

**Or any other object that is not intended to be used inside a play yard**
feature_bullets: Dream On Me 25I-GR, mattress 3" Inner spring mattress fits most Graco play yard
Bacterial waterproof cover that wipes clean with mild soap and water and aids in the prevention of mold, mildew and odor

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars610 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
